Verses: 1 yobu Than Paarvaikku Needhimaanaayirundhapadiyinaal, Avanukku Andha Moondru Manusharum Pradhiyuththaram Solli Oindhaargal.

2 adhinaal Raamin Vamsaththaanaana Poosiyanaagiya Parakeyelin Kumaaran Elikoovukkuk Kobam Moondadhu; Yobu, Dhevanaippaarkkilum Thannaiththaan Needhimaanaakkinadhinimiththam, Avanmelum Avanukkuk Kobam Moondadhu.
3 kodukkaththakka Marumozhi Yobin Moondru Snegidharukkum Adappadaadhirundhum, Avargal Avanai Aagaadhavanendru Theerththadhinimiththam, Avargalmelum Avanukkuk Kobam Moondadhu.
4 avargal Thannaippaarkkilum Vayadhusendravargalaanapadiyinaal, Elikoo Yobin Vaarththaigal Mudindhu Theerumattum Kaaththirundhaan.
5 andha Moondru Manusharin Vaayilum Maruuththaravu Pirakkavillaiyendru Elikoo Kandapodhu, Avanukku Kobam Moondadhu.

6 aadhalaal Parakeyelin Kumaaran Elikoo Ennum Poosiyan Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Ilavayadhullavan, Neengalo Viruththaappiyar; Aagaiyaal Naan Anji, En Abippiraayaththai Ungalukku Munbaaga Velippaduththa Bayandhirundhen.
7 mudhiyor Pesattum, Vayadhusendravargal Gnaanaththai Arivikkattum Endrirundhen.
8 aanaalum Manusharil Oru Aaviyundu; Sarvavallavarudaiya Suvaasame Avargalai Unarvullavargalaakkum.
9 periyorellaam Gnaanigalalla; Mudhiyorellaam Needhiyai Arindhavargalumalla.
10 aagaiyaal Enakku Sevikodungal; Naanum En Abippiraayaththai Velippaduththuven Endren.
11 idho, Ungal Vasanangal Mudiyumattum Kaaththirundhen; Neengal Sollaththakkadhai Aaraaindhu Thedumattum, Ungal Nyaayangalukku Sevikoduththen.
12 naan Ungal Sollai Gavaniththen; Aanaalum Idho, Ungalil Yobukku Nyaayaththaith Theriyakkaatti, Avarudaiya Vasanangalukku Etra Pradhiyuththaram Sollugiravanillai.
13 gnaanaththaik Kandupidiththom Endru Neengal Sollaadhapadi Paarungal; Manushanalla, Dhevane Avarai Jeyankollavendum.
14 avar Ennaippaarththup Pesinadhillai; Neengal Sonna Vaarththaigalinaal Naan Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaram Sollugiravanillai.
15 avargal Kalangi, Appuram Pradhiyuththaram Sollaadhirukkiraargal; Avargalukkup Pechchu Atruppoyitru.
16 avargal Pesaargalo Endru Kaaththirundhen; Aanaalum Avargal Appuram Marumozhi Kodaamalirundhapadiyinaal,
17 naanum Pradhiyuththaramaaga Enakkuth Thondriyamattum Solluven; Naanum En Abippiraayaththai Velippaduththuven.
18 vaarththaigal Enakkul Niraindhirukkiradhu; En Ullaththilulla Aavi Ennai Nerukki Evugiradhu.
19 idho, En Ullam Adaikkappattirundhu, Pudhuth Thuruththigalai Mudhalaaip Peerappannugira Pudhu Rasaththaippolirukkiradhu.
20 naan Aarudhaladaiyumpadi Pesuven; En Udhadugalaith Thirandhu Pradhiyuththaram Solluven.
21 naan Oruvanudaiya Mugaththaip Paaraamalum, Oru Manushanukkum Ichchagam Pesaamalum Iruppenaaga.
22 naan Ichchagam Pesa Ariyen; Pesinaal Ennai Undaakkinavar Seekkiramaai Ennai Eduththukkolvaar.
